timeline.message:
Fix NPE for RoutingDataCache.refresh

If sourceDataTypeMap doesn't contain PropertyType.CUSTOMIZEDVIEW
then RoutingDataCache.refresh() will throw exception if debug is enabled.
This commit fixes that by adding additional checks.
